Struggle against U.S. Political Interference Called for 
    Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Movement for the General Election to Judge the Old Politics on behalf of the June 15 Era in a message addressed to the overseas Koreans on March 16 reportedly declared that the railroading of "the motion on impeachment against the president" through the "National Assembly" was not a simple political action but a political coup staged by the U.S. and pro-U.S. conservative forces including the GNP against democracy.
 It is a "secret" well known to the people that the political coup staged by the GNP was secretly manipulated by the U.S. behind the scene, the message noted, adding that this brought south Korea the disgrace of being "a politically backward state taken in by its operation" and seriously hurt the pride of the Koreans as an excellent nation.    
 The message called on every organization to conduct diverse actions assailing the U.S. political intervention and interference in internal affairs of s. Korea such as issuing a statement and an appeal and contributing its political view to the press and all the Koreans to turn out in the anti-U.S. and anti-GNP struggle to foil the political coup and defend democracy.

PRC Foreign Minister and His Party Arrive
    Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the People's Republic of China Li Zhaoxing and his party arrived here today at the invitation of Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 National flags of the DPRK and the PRC were fluttering on the flagpoles on the airport.    
 They were greeted at the airport by Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned, Wu Donghe, ambassador of the PRC to the DPRK, and staff members of the PRC embassy here.
